Main Components (artview.components)Â¶

ARTview offers some basic Components for visualization of weather radar data using Py-ART and ARTview functions.

RadarDisplay([Vradar, Vfield, Vtilt, ...]) Class to create a display plot, using a returned Radar structure
GridDisplay([Vgrid, Vfield, VlevelZ, ...]) Class to create a display plot, using a Grid structure.
Menu([pathDir, filename, Vradar, Vgrid, ...]) Class to display the MainMenu.
LevelButtonWindow([Vlevel, plot_type, ...]) Class to display the Window with Level radio buttons.
FieldButtonWindow([Vradar, Vfield, name, parent]) Class to display a Window with Field name radio buttons.
LinkSharedVariables([components, name, parent]) Class instance for control variables shared between components.
SelectRegion([VplotAxes, VpathInteriorFunc, ...]) Select a Region of Interest.
PlotDisplay(data[, ydata, plot_type, title, ...]) Class to create a display plot, using data and a key for plot type.
